definition: Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
to show one's colors/to have a clear-cut stand (idiom)
sharp image/clear-cut/in bold outline/in sharp relief

sentences.english: Colors embody the vivid characteristics of the age and fashion.
sentences.chinese: 色彩是赋有鲜明的时代感和时髦性的。

sentences.english: Both Zhang Ailing and Wang Anyi have strong female awareness.
sentences.chinese: 张爱玲与王安忆都有着鲜明的女性意识。

sentences.english: May, who took office earlier this month, is the starkest proponent of this.
sentences.chinese: 本月初就职的梅是这种观念最鲜明的倡导者。

sentences.english: Lao She's fictions contain the distinct spirit of Mohism and chivalry.
sentences.chinese: 老舍小说蕴涵了鲜明的墨侠精神。

sentences.english: It is the striking theme of the ruling history and country history that people are the masters.
sentences.chinese: 人民当家作主成为党的执政史和国史的鲜明主题。

sentences.english: His white hair was in sharp contrast to (with) his dark skin.
sentences.chinese: 他的白头发和他的黑皮肤形成了鲜明的对照。

sentences.english: It also facilitates your fitting and matching, while firefly purple highlights your extraordinary personality.
sentences.chinese: 萤紫色则彰显鲜明的个性情调。

sentences.english: Literary Language is marked by features of a given era and idiosyncrasies of a writer.
sentences.chinese: 文学语言具有鲜明的时代特征和个性特征。

sentences.english: The most salient feature of the new period is reform and opening up.
sentences.chinese: 新时期最鲜明的特点是改革开放。

sentences.english: This plant flowers with a distinct yellow limb of the spathe.
sentences.chinese: 这些椒开花时佛焰苞的冠檐是鲜明的黄色。

sentences.english: Black hair is a sharp contrast to the white skin.
sentences.chinese: 黑发白肤形成鲜明的对照。

sentences.english: Hmm, maybe he couldn't see that huge yellow sign that said CLEARANCE.
sentences.chinese: 我的妈呀，或许他无法看到那巨大鲜明的黄色标志。

sentences.english: Fifth is vivid of the people.
Academic Responsibility Education of Mount Holyoke has remarkable characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 美国蒙特霍约克学院的学术责任教育具有鲜明特色。

sentences.english: Jerry miller was a politician with strong views.
sentences.chinese: 杰里，米勒是一个观点鲜明，态度强硬的政治家。

sentences.english: Obama brought a Chicago-style, hard edge to presidential rhetoric.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马把一种轮廓鲜明的芝加哥风格引入了总统修辞。

definition: prominent/outstanding/to give prominence to/to protrude/to project
dense/thick (fog, clouds etc)/to have a strong interest in/deep/fully saturated (color)
conspicuous/to make sth stand out/make sth prominent
to come to prominence/to appear clearly/to stick out
lit. to fly one's banner on a solitary tree (idiom); fig. to act as a loner/to stand out/to develop one's own school/to have attitude of one's own
to present clearly/to give prominence to/to magnify/clear and obvious
